editionStmt.p: The initial version of this file was created from data kindly provided by the Ethiopic Manuscript Imaging Project directed by Steve Delamarter.

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

msContents.summary: On the Orthodox Faith (De recta fide), በእንተ፡ ርትዕት፡ ሃይማኖት፡ (f-26v); The Beauty of the News, Sena Zena, continuation of the Haymanot Rǝt‘ǝt, by Cyril, addressed to Arcadia and Marina (f-78v); That Christ is One, by Cyril of Alexandria (f-122v); Homily by Theodotus of Ancyra (f-124v); Homily by Cyril of Alexandria (f-125v); Homily by Severus of Synnada (f-126v); Homily by Acacius of Melitene (f-128r); Homily by Juvenalius of Jerusalem (f-129r); Homily by Cyril of Alexandria (f-130v); Homily by Rheginus of Constantinople (130v-131v); Homily by Cyril of Alexandria (f-133r); Homily by Eusiebius of Heraclea (f-134r); Homily by Theodotus of Ancyra (f-135v); Homily by Firmus of Caesarea (f-136r); Epistle of the Synod of Ephesus to John of Antioch (f); Homily by Cyril of Alexandria (f-137r); Epistle of John of Antioch to Cyril of Alexandria (f-138r); Epistle of Cyril of Alexandria to John of Antioch (f-140v); Homily by Epiphanius of Cyprus (f-143v); Homily by Epiphanius of Cyprus on the Trinity (f-144v); Homily by Proclus of Cyzicus (f-148r); Homily by Severianus of Gabala (f-154r); The Faith of Gregory Thaumaturgus (f); The first homily of Cyril of Alexandria on Melchisedec (f-157r); The second homily of Cyril of Alexandria on Melchisedec (157r-160r); Homily by a Sage on Melchisedec (f-161r); On the Nativity and Life of Our Lord (f); Confession of faith (f-163r).
